ipfml.exceptions¶

Module which contains all customs Exceptions used into ipfml package

Exceptions

NumpyDimensionComparisonException() Numpy dimensions comparison Exception raised if two numpy arrays provided do not have same dimensions
NumpyShapeComparisonException() Numpy shape comparison Exception raised if two numpy arrays provided do not have same shape extactly
exception ipfml.exceptions.NumpyDimensionComparisonException[source]¶

Numpy dimensions comparison Exception raised if two numpy arrays provided do not have same dimensions

exception ipfml.exceptions.NumpyShapeComparisonException[source]¶

Numpy shape comparison Exception raised if two numpy arrays provided do not have same shape extactly
